bg.gpii_app_qssWrapper_restartWarningNotifi: За да видите резултатът от промяната на %settingTitle, може да се наложи да рестартирате някои приложения
bg.gpii_psp_aboutDialog_userListenersText: Средства за вписване за тази машина: %listeners
bg.gpii_psp_qssMorePanel_details: Watch this space for more Morphic buttons, as well as additional features to help you tune the computer to your specific needs and preferences
bg.gpii_psp_qssMorePanel_link: For more information on Morphic go to %moreInfoUrl

gpii_qss_saveButtonPresenter_notificatio.keyedOut: За да запазите вашите настройки трябва да си създадете Morphic акаунт. Отидете на %accountUrl.
gpii_qss_saveButtonPresenter_notificatio.keyedIn: Вашите настройки са запазени в Morphic Cloud.

bg.gpii_qssWidget_openUSB_noUsbInserted: В компютъра не са включени USB устройства. Поставете USB и опитайте отново.
bg.gpii_qssWidget_openUSB_ejectUsbDrives: В компютъра няма активни USB устройства. Безопасно е да премахнете всяко устройство в компютъра

gpii_app_qss_settings_close.tooltip:
Close Morphic QuickStrip

You can reopen it using the Morphic Icon (below)

gpii_app_qss_settings_undo.tooltip: Undo the last change you made in the Morphic QuickStrip.
gpii_app_qss_settings_undo.title: Undo

gpii_app_qss_settings_resetAll.tooltip:
Resets computer to standard settings

(does not affect personal saved settings)
gpii_app_qss_settings_resetAll.title: Reset to Standard

gpii_app_qss_settings_save.tooltip: Save your preferences so you can use them on other computers that have Morphic installed.
gpii_app_qss_settings_save.title: Запиши

gpii_app_qss_settings_mySavedSettings.title: My Saved Settings
gpii_app_qss_settings_mySavedSettings.tip:
My Saved Settings

  • To apply your saved settings, insert a Morphic USB key.
  • To re-apply them, remove and then reinsert the Morphic Key.
gpii_app_qss_settings_mySavedSettings.footerTip: The button below will only work if you sign into Morphic automatically when you sign into this computer

gpii_app_qss_settings_more.tooltip: More options for changing the settings on this computer.
gpii_app_qss_settings_more.title:
MORE...

(& HELP)

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.tooltip: Turn “Select to Read Aloud” extension in Chrome browser on/off.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.title: Read Aloud
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.tip: Turns on and adjusts Read Aloud mode in Chrome
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.extendedTip:
To use Read Aloud

  1. Open web page in Chrome
  2. Select / highlight text
  3. Click Play button that pops up

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.tooltip:
Change the contrast between the text and background color, so text is easier to read.

Contrast changes will affect Windows, Edge, Chrome, and some other applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.title: High / Low Contrast
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.tip:
Changes contrast & colors

Works in Chrome, Windows and apps that support Windows contrast themes. (May need to restart some programs)

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.tooltip:
Change whole screen to make everything larger/smaller.

Works for everything.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.title: Screen Zoom
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.tip:
Zooms everything on the screen

Amount of Zoom up and down differs by computer.

gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.tooltip:
Change text size.

Works in Windows, Edge, Chrome, Firefox, Microsoft Office, and many other applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.title: Приближи Приложение / Текст
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.tip:
Zooms one application.

Works in many applications

-- for the Window on top.

(Not a setting so won't Save.)
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.footerTip: You can also use the “CTRL” key, plus SCROLL (wheel or gesture) to do App/Text Zoom without using Morphic.

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.tooltip:
Change Windows language setting.

Works for menus, etc. in Windows, Edge, and many other applications that have Language Packs installed.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.title: Език
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.tip:
Changes Language of Windows

Works in Windows and programs that support Windows language settings.

  • Does not change the language in documents or files.
  • May need to restart some programs.

gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.tooltip: Отваря всички USB флашки свързани с компютъра.
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.title: Отвори USB
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.tip:
Вашето USB Устройство

Поставете USB устройство и го отворете с бутона по-долу.
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.footerTip:
Когато сте готови, предотвратете загуба на данни като премахнете USB устройствата безопасно.

  1. Затворете всички отворени документи от USB устройството и
  2. Тогава използвайте бутона по долу за да премахнете безопасно USB устройствата

gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.tooltip:
Направи Снимка.

Вземи снимка или видео от екрана си.
gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.title: Направи Снимка
gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.tip:
Направи Снимка

Използвайте бутоните по-долу да направите снимка, или видео на екрана си. Моля спазвайте Закона за авторските права!

  • Изполвайте мишката, за да избере зона и цъкнете, за да направите снимката.
  • Кликнете и влачете по екрана за избиране на зона.

gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.tooltip:
Опростяване на Microsoft Word.

Предоставя опростени менюта за Microsoft Word.
gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.title: Опрости MS Word
gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.tip:
Опростяване на Microsoft Word

Morphic може да опрости менютата в (групите менюта горе-вляво в Word), с цел да направи прогрмата по-лека за хора, които не са свикнали.

  • Избери един или повече профила, за да добавиш в Word

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-volume.tooltip: Регулира, включва и изключва силата на звука на Windows.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-volume.title: Сила и изключване на звука
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-volume.extendedTip: Можете също да промените силата на звука, като използвате иконата на високоговорителя в системната лента (близо до часовника в долната част на екрана).

gpii_app_qss_settings_translate-tools.tooltip: Tools to translate text, documents, web pages, or live speech.
gpii_app_qss_settings_translate-tools.title: Translate Tools
gpii_app_qss_settings_translate-tools.tip:
Translate Tools

To translate text, documents, web pages or live speech, try one of the following free services or apps.

Links are for convenience. No endorsement or privacy guarantee.

Microsoft Word 365 has a Translator in its Review ribbon

Web based & Apps
  • Google - Web, Text, Docs
  • Microsoft Bing - Web, Text
  • PROMT - Web
  • Reverso - Web
  • Translate Live - Live Speech
  • Microsoft Translator APP - Web, Text, Live Speech, StreetSigns

NOTE: There are also plug-ins and built-in translation features for different browsers.

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-mouse.tooltip:
Change Windows Mouse setting.

Works in all applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-mouse.title: Adjust Mouse
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-mouse.sideCarWithSettings:
We have provided some of the most commonly used Windows Mouse settings here.

Microsoft also provides other mouse settings. The following links will take you directly to the key additional Mouse settings in the Windows Setting screens.

  • Mouse button and scroll modes
  • Mouse Keys
  • Touchpad sensitivity (if your computer has a touchpad)
  • Cursor and pointer size, color, and touch feedback

gpii_app_qss_settings_url-customize-qss.tooltip: Отваря уеб страница където да промените бутоните в лентата.
gpii_app_qss_settings_url-customize-qss.title: Промени бутоните

bg.gpii_userErrors_EADDRINUSE-subhead: There is another application listening on the same port
bg.gpii_userErrors_EADDRINUSE-details: Stop the other running application and try again. If the problem is still present, contact Morphic Technical Support.
bg.gpii_userErrors_KeyInFail-details: Try restarting your computer. If this problem continues, contact Morphic Technical Support.
bg.gpii_userErrors_NoConnection-subhead: Morphic cannot see the cloud to get your settings.
bg.gpii_userErrors_NoConnection-details: Check your internet connection and try again.
bg.gpii_userErrors_WriteSettingFail-subhead: Morphic couldn't change one of the settings you asked for.
bg.gpii_userErrors_WriteSettingFail-details: You can try again or make the change manually. If the problems continues, try restarting the program or your computer.The setting that Morphic could not change is: %settingName in %appName
bg.gpii_userErrors_ReadSettingFail-subhead: Morphic couldn't read one of the settings that you asked for.
bg.gpii_userErrors_ReadSettingFail-details: If the problem continues, try restarting the program or your computer.The setting that Morphic could not read is: %settingName of application %appName
bg.gpii_userErrors_StartApplicationFail-sub: To turn on the setting you requested, Morphic needs to start %appName.
bg.gpii_userErrors_StartApplicationFail-det: You can start the program yourself.  If this problem continues, try restarting your computer.
bg.gpii_userErrors_StopApplicationFail-subh: Morphic needs to stop %appName to turn off a setting.
bg.gpii_userErrors_StopApplicationFail-deta: You can stop the program yourself. If this problem continues, try restarting your computer.
bg.gpii_userErrors_SaveToCloudFail-subhead: Your settings have not been saved to your online account and are not available to use on other computers.
bg.gpii_userErrors_SaveToCloudFail-details: Check your internet connection and your Morphic account password and try again.

en.gpii_app_qssWrapper_restartWarningNotifi: To see the %settingTitle change, you may need to restart some applications.
en.gpii_psp_aboutDialog_userListenersText: Keys that work on this machine: %listeners

en.gpii_psp_qssMorePanel_link: For more information on Morphic go to %moreInfoUrl

gpii_qss_saveButtonPresenter_notificatio.keyedIn: Your settings were saved to the Morphic Cloud.

en.gpii_qssWidget_openUSB_noUsbInserted: There are no USB drives plugged into the computer. Insert your USB and try again.
en.gpii_qssWidget_openUSB_ejectUsbDrives: There are no USB drives active in the computer. It is safe to remove any drive in the computer

gpii_app_qss_settings_close.tooltip:
Close Morphic QuickStrip

You can reopen it using the Morphic Icon (below)

gpii_app_qss_settings_undo.tooltip: Undo the last change you made in the Morphic QuickStrip.
gpii_app_qss_settings_undo.title: Undo

gpii_app_qss_settings_resetAll.tooltip:
Resets to the standard settings for this computer

(and signs you out of Morphic but does not change your saved settings)
gpii_app_qss_settings_resetAll.title: Reset to Standard

gpii_app_qss_settings_save.tooltip: Save your preferences so you can use them on other computers that have Morphic installed.
gpii_app_qss_settings_save.title: Save

gpii_app_qss_settings_mySavedSettings.title: My Saved Settings
gpii_app_qss_settings_mySavedSettings.footerTip:
• To apply your saved settings, insert a Morphic USB key.
  • To re-apply them, remove and then reinsert the Morphic Key.

gpii_app_qss_settings_more.tooltip: More options for changing the settings on this computer.
gpii_app_qss_settings_more.title:
MORE...

(& HELP)

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.tooltip: Turn “Select to Read Aloud” extension in Chrome browser on/off.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.title: Chrome Read Aloud
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.tip: Turns on and adjusts Read Aloud mode in Chrome
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.extendedTip:
To use Read Aloud

  1. Open web page in Chrome
  2. Select / highlight text
  3. Click Play button that pops up
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.sideCar:
On this menu you can turn on the Read Aloud function installed in the Chrome Browser. When Read Aloud is turned on:

  1. Select / Highlight text in Chrome
  2. Click Play button that pops up

NOTE: when you first turn on read aloud you may have to refresh open pages first.

Microsoft Edge browser also has a Read Aloud mode. It is always on. To use it:

  1. Open the Edge browser
  2. Right-click a webpage and choose “Read Aloud” from the menu

A Read Aloud toolbar will appear in Edge where you can control the reading.

Microsoft Word and OneNote also have read aloud features. You can learn more about read aloud on the Morphic knowledge base.

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.tooltip:
Change the contrast between the text and background color, so text is easier to read.

Contrast changes will affect Windows, Edge, Chrome, and some other applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.title: High / Low Contrast
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.tip:
Changes contrast & colors

Works in Chrome, Edge, and apps that support Windows contrast themes. (May need to restart some apps.)
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.sideCar:
On this menu you can change to light mode, dark mode, or a variety of high and low contrast choices.

Not all applications support all settings. You may also need to restart some applications to see an effect.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.sideCarWithSettings:
On this menu you can change to light mode, dark mode, or a variety of high and low contrast choices.

Not all applications support all settings. You may also need to restart some applications to see an effect.

Here are links to take you directly to the full set of Contrast tools in Windows Settings:

  • Windows Color Settings - change color mode and accent colors
  • Windows High contrast Settings - customize colors for the high contrast mode

NOTE: Only the high or low contrast settings on the left will work in Chrome.

NOTE: Currently Morphic only saves the contrast settings in the list to the left.

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.tooltip:
Change whole screen to make everything larger/smaller.

Works for everything.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.title: Screen Zoom
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.tip:
Zooms everything on the screen

Amount of Zoom up and down differs by computer.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.sideCarWithSettings:
Screen Zoom uses the Windows Screen Scale feature to let you make things larger or smaller on screen to match your preferences.

Windows also provides other ways to change the screen size or zoom parts of the interface. Use these links to go to the appropriate places in Windows Settings:

  • Display settings
  • Advanced display settings (only available on devices that support advanced settings)
  • Ease of access display settings

gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.tooltip:
Changes text size.

Works with many applications including Edge, Chrome, Firefox, Microsoft Office, and more.
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.title: Zoom Top Window
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.tip:
Zoom Top Window

Note: Not all windows zoom.
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.footerTip: Want a faster way to zoom a window?
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.sideCar:
The “Top Window Zoom” buttons are provided to make zooming the text in many application Windows easy.

But there are even faster ways to do this that do not require you to open the QuickStrip at all. Again, they do not work in all applications but they work in many.

  • You can hold CTRL down and use the scrollwheel on your mouse to zoom in/out
  • Hold the CTRL key down and use the + and - keys on keyboard to zoom in/out

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.tooltip:
Change Language of Menus & Ribbons.

Works in Windows, Edge, Office and other programs with language packs installed.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.title: Language of Menus
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.tip:
Change Language of Menus/Ribbons

Works in Windows, and other apps that support Windows language settings.

  • Does not translate documents etc.
  • You may need to restart some apps to see change.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.sideCar:
The language choices in the list are the Microsoft languages approved by your IT department for this site.

To add another language to the list - see your IT department.

(On personal and home machines - a SETUP Tool will be available to select the languages for you computer)

gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.tooltip: Open and safely Eject all USB flash drives plugged into the computer.
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.title: Open & Eject USB
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.tip:
Your USB Drive

Insert a USB drive and open it with the button below.
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.footerTip:
When you are done, prevent data loss by ejecting USB drives safely.

  1. Close all documents opened from the USB drive and
  2. Then use the button below to safely eject the USB drives
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.sideCar:
On this menu you can open all of the USB drives plugged into your computer with one click.

When you are done with your USB drives, use this menu again to eject your drives safely. This will help keep your data safe.

gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.tooltip:
Screen Capture.

Take pictures of all or part of the screen.
gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.title: Screen Capture
gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.tip:
Screen Capture

To capture all or part of the screen

  • Click either button below
  • Then click and drag the mouse to select the part of the screen you want.
  • Let go of the mouse button. DONE.

The top button lets you “COPY” some or all of the screen so you can then “PASTE” it into any email, document, etc. (using Ctrl-V).

The 2nd button creates a “Picture” like a camera. You will find the file on your desktop.
enum: Make COPY to PASTE into doc, email, etc.
Take PICTURE and save to desktop
gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.sideCar:
This Screen capture tool uses the open source software ShareX to capture settings with high precision.

ShareX has many other features available. Open ShareX by pressing the Windows key and typing ShareX.

Microsoft also has a built in screen capture tool called Snipping Tool that you can call up by pressing WinKey+Shift+S.

gpii_app_qss_settings_cloud-folder-open.tooltip: The Quick Folder has commonly requested documents, web pages, and other resources.
gpii_app_qss_settings_cloud-folder-open.title: Open Quick Folder

gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.tooltip:
Microsoft Word simplification.

Provides simpler menus for Microsoft Word
gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.title: MS Word Simplify
gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.tip:
Microsoft Word simplification

Morphic can add simpler ribbons (the menu bars with icons at the top of Word) to make it easier for people who don't use all the options.

  • Choose one or both to add them to Word
gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.sideCar:
You can also create your own custom Microsoft Word Ribbons on your own computer.

To create a customized ribbon right click on the right edge of the ribbon bar and select “Customize Ribbons”. Further instructions are available on the Microsoft Office support site.

NOTE: User customized ribbons are not currently captured and saved by Morphic.

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-volume.tooltip: Adjusts Windows Volume and provides Mute on/off.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-volume.title: Volume & Mute
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-volume.sideCar: A quicker and easier way to change the volume is to just click on the speaker icon on the system tray (near the clock at the bottom of the screen).

gpii_app_qss_settings_translate-tools.tooltip: Tools to translate text, documents, web pages, or live speech.
gpii_app_qss_settings_translate-tools.title: Translate Tools
gpii_app_qss_settings_translate-tools.tip:
Translate Tools

To translate text, documents, web pages or live speech, try one of the following free services or apps.

Links are for convenience. No endorsement or privacy guarantee.

Microsoft Word 365 has a Translator in its Review ribbon

Web based & Apps
  • Google - Web, Text, Docs
  • Microsoft Bing - Web, Text
  • PROMT - Web
  • Reverso - Web
  • Translate Live - Live Speech
  • Microsoft Translator APP - Web, Text, Live Speech, StreetSigns

NOTE: There are also plug-ins and built-in translation features for different browsers.

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-mouse.tooltip:
Change Windows Mouse setting.

Works in all applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-mouse.title: Adjust Mouse
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-mouse.sideCarWithSettings:
We have provided some of the most commonly used Windows Mouse settings here.

Microsoft also provides other mouse settings. The following links will take you directly to the key additional Mouse settings in the Windows Setting screens.

  • Mouse button and scroll modes
  • Mouse Keys
  • Touchpad sensitivity (if your computer has a touchpad)
  • Cursor and pointer size, color, and touch feedback

gpii_app_qss_settings_url-customize-qss.tooltip: Open the web tool to customize quickstrip's buttons.
gpii_app_qss_settings_url-customize-qss.title: Customize Quickstrip

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.title: Chrome Read Aloud
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.tip: Turns on and adjusts Read Aloud mode in Chrome
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.extendedTip:
To use Read Aloud

  1. Open web page in Chrome
  2. Select / highlight text
  3. Click Play button that pops up
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-selfVoicing.sideCar:
On this menu you can turn on the Read Aloud function installed in the Chrome Browser. When Read Aloud is turned on:

  1. Select / Highlight text in Chrome
  2. Click Play button that pops up

NOTE: when you first turn on read aloud you may have to refresh open pages first.

Microsoft Edge browser also has a Read Aloud mode. It is always on. To use it:

  1. Open the Edge browser
  2. Right-click a webpage and choose “Read Aloud” from the menu

A Read Aloud toolbar will appear in Edge where you can control the reading.

Microsoft Word and OneNote also have read aloud features. You can learn more about read aloud on the Morphic knowledge base.

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.tooltip:
Change the contrast between the text and background color, so text is easier to read.

Contrast changes will affect Windows, Edge, Chrome, and some other applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.title: High / Low Contrast
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.tip:
Changes contrast & colors

Works in Chrome, Edge, and apps that support Windows contrast themes. (May need to restart some apps.)
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.sideCar:
On this menu you can change to light mode, dark mode, or a variety of high and low contrast choices.

Not all applications support all settings. You may also need to restart some applications to see an effect.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-highContras.sideCarWithSettings:
On this menu you can change to light mode, dark mode, or a variety of high and low contrast choices.

Not all applications support all settings. You may also need to restart some applications to see an effect.

Here are links to take you directly to the full set of Contrast tools in Windows Settings:

  • Windows Color Settings - change color mode and accent colors
  • Windows High contrast Settings - customize colors for the high contrast mode

NOTE: Only the high or low contrast settings on the left will work in Chrome.

NOTE: Currently Morphic only saves the contrast settings in the list to the left.

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.tooltip:
Change whole screen to make everything larger/smaller.

Works for everything.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.title: Screen Zoom
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.tip:
Zooms everything on the screen

Amount of Zoom up and down differs by computer.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-DPIScale.sideCarWithSettings:
Screen Zoom uses the Windows Screen Scale feature to let you make things larger or smaller on screen to match your preferences.

Windows also provides other ways to change the screen size or zoom parts of the interface. Use these links to go to the appropriate places in Windows Settings:

  • Display settings
  • Advanced display settings (only available on devices that support advanced settings)
  • Ease of access display settings

gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.tooltip:
Changes text size.

Works with many applications including Edge, Chrome, Firefox, Microsoft Office, and more.
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.title: Zoom Top Window
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.tip:
Zoom Top Window

Note: Not all windows zoom.
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.footerTip: Want a faster way to zoom a window?
gpii_app_qss_settings_appTextZoom.sideCar:
The “Top Window Zoom” buttons are provided to make zooming the text in many application Windows easy.

But there are even faster ways to do this that do not require you to open the QuickStrip at all. Again, they do not work in all applications but they work in many.

  • You can hold CTRL down and use the scrollwheel on your mouse to zoom in/out
  • Hold the CTRL key down and use the + and - keys on keyboard to zoom in/out

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.tooltip:
Change Language of Menus & Ribbons.

Works in Windows, Edge, Office and other programs with language packs installed.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.title: Language of Menus
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.tip:
Change Language of Menus/Ribbons

Works in Windows, and other apps that support Windows language settings.

  • Does not translate documents etc.
  • You may need to restart some apps to see change.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-language.sideCar:
The language choices in the list are the Microsoft languages approved by your IT department for this site.

To add another language to the list - see your IT department.

(On personal and home machines - a SETUP Tool will be available to select the languages for you computer)

gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.tooltip: Open and safely Eject all USB flash drives plugged into the computer.
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.title: Open & Eject USB
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.tip:
Your USB Drive

Insert a USB drive and open it with the button below.
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.footerTip:
When you are done, prevent data loss by ejecting USB drives safely.

  1. Close all documents opened from the USB drive and
  2. Then use the button below to safely eject the USB drives
gpii_app_qss_settings_usb-open.sideCar:
On this menu you can open all of the USB drives plugged into your computer with one click.

When you are done with your USB drives, use this menu again to eject your drives safely. This will help keep your data safe.

gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.tooltip:
Screen Capture.

Take pictures of all or part of the screen.
gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.title: Screen Capture
gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.tip:
Screen Capture

To capture all or part of the screen

  • Click either button below
  • Then click and drag the mouse to select the part of the screen you want.
  • Let go of the mouse button. DONE.

The top button lets you “COPY” some or all of the screen so you can then “PASTE” it into any email, document, etc. (using Ctrl-V).

The 2nd button creates a “Picture” like a camera. You will find the file on your desktop.
enum: Make COPY to PASTE into doc, email, etc.
Take PICTURE and save to desktop
gpii_app_qss_settings_screenCapture.sideCar:
This Screen capture tool uses the open source software ShareX to capture settings with high precision.

ShareX has many other features available. Open ShareX by pressing the Windows key and typing ShareX.

Microsoft also has a built in screen capture tool called Snipping Tool that you can call up by pressing WinKey+Shift+S.

gpii_app_qss_settings_cloud-folder-open.tooltip: The Quick Folder has commonly requested documents, web pages, and other resources.
gpii_app_qss_settings_cloud-folder-open.title: Open Quick Folder

gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.tooltip:
Microsoft Word simplification.

Provides simpler menus for Microsoft Word
gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.title: MS Word Simplify
gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.tip:
Microsoft Word simplification

Morphic can add simpler ribbons (the menu bars with icons at the top of Word) to make it easier for people who don't use all the options.

  • Choose one or both to add them to Word
gpii_app_qss_settings_officeSimplificati.sideCar:
You can also create your own custom Microsoft Word Ribbons on your own computer.

To create a customized ribbon right click on the right edge of the ribbon bar and select “Customize Ribbons”. Further instructions are available on the Microsoft Office support site.

NOTE: User customized ribbons are not currently captured and saved by Morphic.

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-volume.title: Volume & Mute
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-volume.sideCar: A quicker and easier way to change the volume is to just click on the speaker icon on the system tray (near the clock at the bottom of the screen).

gpii_app_qss_settings_translate-tools.tooltip: Tools to translate text, documents, web pages, or live speech.
gpii_app_qss_settings_translate-tools.title: Translate Tools
gpii_app_qss_settings_translate-tools.tip:
Translate Tools

To translate text, documents, web pages or live speech, try one of the following free services or apps.

Links are for convenience. No endorsement or privacy guarantee.

Microsoft Word 365 has a Translator in its Review ribbon

Web based & Apps
  • Google - Web, Text, Docs
  • Microsoft Bing - Web, Text
  • PROMT - Web
  • Reverso - Web
  • Translate Live - Live Speech
  • Microsoft Translator APP - Web, Text, Live Speech, StreetSigns

NOTE: There are also plug-ins and built-in translation features for different browsers.

gpii_app_qss_settings_common-mouse.tooltip:
Change Windows Mouse setting.

Works in all applications.
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-mouse.title: Adjust Mouse
gpii_app_qss_settings_common-mouse.sideCarWithSettings:
We have provided some of the most commonly used Windows Mouse settings here.

Microsoft also provides other mouse settings. The following links will take you directly to the key additional Mouse settings in the Windows Setting screens.

  • Mouse button and scroll modes
  • Mouse Keys
  • Touchpad sensitivity (if your computer has a touchpad)
  • Cursor and pointer size, color, and touch feedback

gpii_app_qss_settings_url-customize-qss.tooltip: Open the web tool to customize quickstrip's buttons.
gpii_app_qss_settings_url-customize-qss.title: Customize Quickstrip

es.gpii_userErrors_EADDRINUSE-subhead: There is another application listening on the same port
es.gpii_userErrors_EADDRINUSE-details: Stop the other running application and try again. If the problem is still present, contact Morphic Technical Support.
es.gpii_userErrors_KeyInFail-details: Try restarting your computer. If this problem continues, contact Morphic Technical Support.
es.gpii_userErrors_NoConnection-subhead: Morphic cannot see the cloud to get your settings.
es.gpii_userErrors_NoConnection-details: Check your internet connection and try again.
es.gpii_userErrors_WriteSettingFail-subhead: Morphic couldn't change one of the settings you asked for.
es.gpii_userErrors_WriteSettingFail-details: You can try again or make the change manually. If the problems continues, try restarting the program or your computer.The setting that Morphic could not change is: %settingName in %appName
es.gpii_userErrors_ReadSettingFail-subhead: Morphic couldn't read one of the settings that you asked for.
es.gpii_userErrors_ReadSettingFail-details: If the problem continues, try restarting the program or your computer.The setting that Morphic could not read is: %settingName of application %appName
es.gpii_userErrors_StartApplicationFail-sub: To turn on the setting you requested, Morphic needs to start %appName.
es.gpii_userErrors_StartApplicationFail-det: You can start the program yourself.  If this problem continues, try restarting your computer.
es.gpii_userErrors_StopApplicationFail-subh: Morphic needs to stop %appName to turn off a setting.
es.gpii_userErrors_StopApplicationFail-deta: You can stop the program yourself. If this problem continues, try restarting your computer.
es.gpii_userErrors_SaveToCloudFail-subhead: Your settings have not been saved to your online account and are not available to use on other computers.
es.gpii_userErrors_SaveToCloudFail-details: Check your internet connection and your Morphic account password and try again.
